parameters.name: CommodityCode
parameters.description:
The commodity code.

Valid values on the China site (aliyun.com):

*   **ga_gapluspre_public_cn**: GA instance.
*   **ga_plusbwppre_public_cn**: basic bandwidth plan.

Valid values on the international site (alibabacloud.com):

*   **ga_pluspre_public_intl**: GA instance.
*   **ga_bwppreintl_public_intl:** basic bandwidth plan.

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The type of the order. Valid values:

*   **BUY**: purchase order.
*   **RENEW**: renewal order.
*   **UPGRADE**: upgrade order.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Global Accelerator (GA) instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
